attributes.action: stop point 9 pence pricing of fuel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
this is a complete deliberate misleading way of pricing something. as we do not deal in such an amount. i can not understand how it is even legal. we removed the .5p coin. how many things you see sold with .5p. NONE
you can not buy 1 liter of fuel and correctly pay for it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
